person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: * The Democratic Convention signed an agreement on government and parliamentary support with its coalition partners the Social Democratic Union and the Hungarian Democratic Union ( UDMR ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| Democratic Convention |
| Social Democratic Union |
| Hungarian Democratic Union (UDMR) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Democratic Convention |
| Social Democratic Union |
| Hungarian Democratic Union (UDMR) |

These are the entities that clearly refer to persons as defined in the paragraph. The Democratic Convention and the Social Democratic Union and Hungarian Democratic Union (UDMR) are political organizations, but they can also be considered as collective nouns representing the people who make up these organizations. Therefore, they can be considered as persons in this context.
